name: Mexican Atole
author: Lizzie
summary: Atole is a popular Mexican hot beverage, thickened with masa and flavored with cinnamon and brown sugar.  Try this soothing beverage after dinner or in the afternoon with some cookies. You can be creative and add some pureed fruit if you wish!
directions: Place the masa, water, cinnamon and piloncillo in a blender
Pour the contents of the blender into a sauce pan and bring the mixture to boil over medium heat, stirring constantly
When the mixture reaches a boil, turn the heat to low and continue to whisk for 5 minutes
Remove the pan from the heat and stir in the vanilla
Pour into mugs and serve hot
